name: Breakdown
description: A two round competition consisting of a written round of chemistry, math and physics puzzles and a practical round where you find a solution to a story.

name: Contraption
description: Build an innovative model based on a problem statement.

name: Industry Defined Problem
description: An industry defines a problem that they have faced, teams present a solution to this in front of industry personnel.

name: Catalysis - Workshop
description: A Technology Orientation Workshop on Industry Perspective on Chemical Process Design, Operations and Control.

name: Online Quiz
description: An online quiz hosted on Facebook.
